postcache.script: if (!Cmd.locate('uglifyjs')) { if (!Cmd.locate('npm')) { throw 'Cannot locate the "npm" utility.' } else { run('npm install -g uglify-js')}}
if (!Cmd.locate('ng-annotate')) { if (!Cmd.locate('npm')) { throw 'Cannot locate the "npm" utility.' } else { run('npm install -g ng-annotate')}}
